Configure required data in the anesthesia plan section

1 Click the Basic Configuration tab.

2 To require users to document the patient’s ASA type, select the ASA type required check box.

3 In Selected Sections, click the name of the anesthesia plan section.

4 Click Setup.

5 In Required Subsections, select the check boxes next to the subsections that must be completed for every patient.

6 When you are finished configuring Preop Manager, click Close.
